room_title: Escape room "Benedict's Study" by Paradox Point in Saginaw
review: We had a great time at the Benedict Arnold room at Paradox Point. It was our first experience at an escape room. So much fun. Highly recommend checking it out. We escaped with 5 minutes to spare. Loved it!

room_title: Escape room "Benedict's Study" by Paradox Point in Saginaw
review: Took my 12-year-old's birthday party and did the Benedicts study room. We had fun, staff was nice, cute decor and clean. Price was reasonable in my opinion as we checked at a few other spots and for our party of six, $20/person was great in comparison to 28/person at other locations for a party of the same size.

room_title: Escape room "Benedict's Study" by Paradox Point in Saginaw
review: Did the Benedict Arnold one, challenging but awesome! Great way to spend my birthday!
